articles.author: Kaanita Iyer, Priscilla Alvarez
articles.title: Trump administration plans to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Eswatini - CNN
articles.description: The Trump administration informed Kilmar Abrego Garcia on Friday that it now plans to deport him to the tiny African nation of Eswatini, as he continues to fight efforts to re-deport him.
articles.content:
The Trump administration informed Kilmar Abrego Garcia on Friday that it now plans to deport him to the tiny African nation of Eswatini, as he continues to fight efforts to re-deport him.

articles.author: Tobi Raji
articles.title: 15 dead after new Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo - The Washington Post
articles.description: Health officials have recorded at least 28 suspected cases amid the central African nation’s 16th outbreak of the deadly disease.
articles.content: At least 15 people from the Democratic Republic of Congo, including four health care workers, died following a new outbreak of the Ebola virus, the central African nations 16th major brush with the d… [+57 chars]
